title: travelplanner: Could you construct a 7-day travel itinerary for a group of 4, beginning in Monterey and exploring 3 cities in Texas from March 9th to March 15th, 2022? We've allocated a budget of $15,600 for this trip. Food-wise, we're particularly interested in trying out French and Chinese cuisines. (1dd8a5d7f6ff7964)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you construct a 7-day travel itinerary for a group of 4, beginning in Monterey and exploring 3 cities in Texas from March 9th to March 15th, 2022? We've allocated a budget of $15,600 for this trip. Food-wise, we're particularly interested in trying out French and Chinese cuisines.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Find a 7-day trip to Texas from March 9th to March 15th 2022, for a group of 4, starting in Monterey, visiting 3 cities in Texas. The total budget for this trip is $15600. French and Chinese cuisine should be included in the itinerary."}

chat_history.content:
I'm sorry, I couldn't find any flights from Monterey to Austin on the 9th of March 2022. However, if you can fly out one day earlier, on the 8th, here is an itinerary that satisfies your other requests:
## Cities:
- Austin
- Houston
- Dallas
## Day 1 (March 8th):
- Fly from Monterey to Austin on Flight F3886931, leaving at 17:20 and arriving at 18:50 for $41
- Eat at The Kasbah, a cafe serving pizza, BBQ, and fast food.
## Day 2 (March 9th):
- Enjoy Austin.
- Eat at Cafe Coffee Day, a cafe serving French, bakery and BBQ food.
## Day 3 (March 10th):
- Fly from Austin to Houston on Flight F3878989, leaving at 07:41 and arriving at 08:42 for $32
- Eat at 34 Park Street Lane, a restaurant serving Chinese, bakery and cafe food.
## Day 4 (March 11th):
- Enjoy Houston.
- Eat at The BrewMaster - The Mix Fine Dine, a restaurant serving French, Indian, cafe and seafood food.
## Day 5 (March 12th):
- Fly from Houston to Dallas on Flight F3974464, leaving at 20:43 and arriving at 22:15 for $104
- Eat at L'Opera, a restaurant serving French, bakery, fast food, seafood.
## Day 6 (March 13th):
- Enjoy Dallas.
- Eat at Coconuts Fish Cafe, a cafe serving BBQ, Mediterranean, fast food.
## Day 7 (March 14th):
- Fly from Dallas to Monterey on Flight F4046658, leaving at 11:38 and arriving at 13:15 for $690

The total cost of your flights will be $870, and the total cost of your trip will be $870.
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
# Texas 7-Day Itinerary

Unfortunately, I couldn't find any flights available for the 9th of March, but if you're able to travel a day earlier, here's a suggested itinerary:

## Day 1 (March 8th)
- Fly from Monterey to Austin on Flight F3886931, departing at 17:20 and arriving at 18:50. The flight costs $41 and you'll be travelling with your 3 companions.
- Have dinner at The Kasbah, a café serving pizza, BBQ, and fast food.

## Day 2 (March 9th)
- Spend the day exploring Austin.
- In the evening, dine at Cafe Coffee Day, where you can enjoy French cuisine, along with bakery items and BBQ.

## Day 3 (March 10th)
- Catch Flight F3878989 from Austin to Houston at 07:41, arriving at 08:42. The flight will cost $32.
- Head to 34 Park Street Lane for lunch or dinner. This restaurant offers Chinese cuisine alongside bakery items and other café fare.

## Day 4 (March 11th)
- Discover the sights of Houston.
- Visit The BrewMaster - The Mix Fine Dine for a French culinary experience, as well as Indian, café, and seafood options.

## Day 5 (March 12th)
- In the evening, depart Houston for Dallas on Flight F3974464, leaving at 20:43 and landing at 22:15. The flight is priced at $104.
- Stop by L'Opera for a late dinner, serving French pastries, seafood, and fast food.

## Day 6 (March 13th)
- Spend the day exploring Dallas.
- Savor BBQ, Mediterranean, and fast food dishes at Coconuts Fish Cafe.

## Day 7 (March 14th)
- Take Flight F4046658 from Dallas back to Monterey, departing at 11:38 and arriving at 13:15. The flight will cost $690.

The total cost of your flights is $867, leaving you with a substantial remainder of your budget to cover accommodation, transportation within cities, and other activities.

Please note that this itinerary provides a rough framework, and you may wish to book activities and make further restaurant reservations based on your group's specific interests.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

chat_history.name: restaurant_search

chat_history.content:
I'm sorry, I couldn't find any flights from Monterey to Austin on the 9th of March 2022. However, if you can fly out one day earlier, on the 8th, here is an itinerary that satisfies your other requests:
## Cities:
- Austin
- Houston
- Dallas
## Day 1 (March 8th):
- Fly from Monterey to Austin on Flight F3886931, leaving at 17:20 and arriving at 18:50 for $41
- Eat at The Kasbah, a cafe serving pizza, BBQ, and fast food.
## Day 2 (March 9th):
- Enjoy Austin.
- Eat at Cafe Coffee Day, a cafe serving French, bakery and BBQ food.
## Day 3 (March 10th):
- Fly from Austin to Houston on Flight F3878989, leaving at 07:41 and arriving at 08:42 for $32
- Eat at 34 Park Street Lane, a restaurant serving Chinese, bakery and cafe food.
## Day 4 (March 11th):
- Enjoy Houston.
- Eat at The BrewMaster - The Mix Fine Dine, a restaurant serving French, Indian, cafe and seafood food.
## Day 5 (March 12th):
- Fly from Houston to Dallas on Flight F3974464, leaving at 20:43 and arriving at 22:15 for $104
- Eat at L'Opera, a restaurant serving French, bakery, fast food, seafood.
## Day 6 (March 13th):
- Enjoy Dallas.
- Eat at Coconuts Fish Cafe, a cafe serving BBQ, Mediterranean, fast food.
## Day 7 (March 14th):
- Fly from Dallas to Monterey on Flight F4046658, leaving at 11:38 and arriving at 13:15 for $690

The total cost of your flights will be $870, and the total cost of your trip will be $870.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
